content: Is the number game down for everyone else or just me - https://adam.math.hhu.de ?
Looks like it, yes. Can't access either
@Jon Eugster is maybe the person to ping?
sorry! It's up again. Our server is too small :(
(@Matvey Lorkish might also be a good person to ping in future)
Hello guys! I am Matvey you can ping or DM me if there seems to be something out of order. I will try to fix it asap.

Keywords so this can be more easily found in the future when needed.

Lean Game Server
Natural Number Game
Robo
Set Theory Game
A Lean Intro to Logic
Knights And Knaves Game
Is it just me
@Matvey Lorkish is NNG down again? I was about to post a blog post linking to it.

Kevin Buzzard said:

is NNG down again?

It is up for me but the images, PNG or such are not displaying. The buttons are working and new pages are displaying.
I'm getting net::ERR_CONTENT_LENGTH_MISMATCH 200 on static assets (like JS). Indeed their content seems randomly cutoff.
Same here, it was up for a few days since the original post (enough for me to finish the set theory game) and now it's down with the same error.
I will look into it!
NNG4 should work now again, and the sever should be more memory stable now.

Dan Abramov said:

I'm getting net::ERR_CONTENT_LENGTH_MISMATCH 200 on static assets (like JS). Indeed their content seems randomly cutoff.

Could you please me how to replicate this error? I did not manage to do so.
Please feel free to ping me if something is off again :smile:
@Matvey Lorkish is NNG down again?
It looks like yes with the same content length issue.

It's been awhile since I had to look at anything in this realm, but the content size is suspiciously near 65K -- maybe your nginx settings (or the defaults) are allocating too-small buffers for the response.
max_response_body_size looks like maybe the relevant setting, probably look first in the nginx logs to see what you see there.
Thank you for the tipp, I will look into it once I get the chance for it!
